briefTitle: Long-term Oncologic Outcome of Breast-conserving Surgery in Breast Cancer Patients With BRCA1/2 Mutations
officialTitle: Ong-term Oncologic Outcome of Breast-conserving Surgery in Breast Cancer Patients With BRCA1/2 Mutations
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Primary invasive breast cancer who underwent BCS or mastectomy
* Received a BRCA1/2 mutation test

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients with de novo metastasis
* Pregnancy-associated breast cancer
